actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-641.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Pollock-Herreid unit, South Dakota pumping division, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, South Dakota.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-641) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate and maintain the Pollock-Herreid unit, South Dakota pumping division, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, South Dakota. Prohibits the use of water from the unit authorized by this Act to irrigate lands for the production of specified agricultural commodities for a period of ten years. Provides, under Federal reclamation laws, that lands held in a single ownership which may be eligible to receive water from, through, or by means of unit works shall be limited to 160 acres of class I land or the equivalent in other land classes. Authorizes appropriation of $26,000,000 for construction of the Pollock-Herried unit.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Pollock-Herreid unit, South Dakota pumping division, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, South Dakota.
